content:
path /dns/v1/stacks/stackid/zones/zoneid/discovernameservers
operationId GetNameserversForZone
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
name zoneid
description A DNS zone ID
in path
required True
schema
type string
summary Get a zones nameservers
responses
200
zoneGetNameserversForZoneResponse
type object
properties
configured
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not all required name servers are configured in the zone
currentNameservers
type string
description The zones currently configured nameservers
requiredNameservers
type string
description The nameservers required in the zones configuration
description A response from a request to retrieve information about a DNS zones authoritative nameservers
